input.sentences: i moved into my new house last week !
the kitchen is still being unpacked | but its shaping up well .
my bathroom is totally done | i even got new rugs for the floor .
my spare bedroom is still in boxes | but the bed is set up .
my favorite room is my attached bathroom | i 've completely finished decorating in there .
output.sentences: Moving to a new house was this week.
We started by unpacking the kitchen.
We totally loved the rugs on our floor.
We put the boxes in the spare bedroom.
Finally we finished after I put out my favorite decorations.
